data: {"concept_id": "character_voice", "concept_name": "Character & Voice", "type": "element", "definition": "Voice = pattern of thinking made audible. Devices reveal want, worldview, and flaws in real time.", "scope_notes": "Not accent or vocab list alone; it’s motive + pattern under pressure. Imperfection (‘wrongness’) is diagnostic.", "axes": "device|intent", "axis_values": "repetition|anticlimax|malapropism|double_entendre|word_salad|pun | deliberate|accidental", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "dialogue|beats|subtext|tension", "conflicts_with": "generic_voice|device_spam|sterile_perfection", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_voice_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_voice_weak_*", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_repetition_urgency", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "repetition|deliberate", "description": "Echoed words/phrases to push urgency or to be heard.", "detection_hint": "Back-to-back repeats, anaphora, epistrophe, echo questions.", "false_positive_risks": "Padding without intent; comedy catchphrase.", "minimal_example": "“Listen to me—listen.”", "counterexample": "Random filler repeats with no pressure.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_anticlimax_mask", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "anticlimax|deliberate", "description": "Deflates tension on purpose; dodges sincerity with humor.", "detection_hint": "Build-up then trivial pivot or self-undercut.", "false_positive_risks": "Unintended letdown due to weak stakes.", "minimal_example": "“I love you—kidding. Mostly.”", "counterexample": "Flat line that never built tension.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_malaprop_ambition", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "malapropism|accidental", "description": "Wrong-but-near word reveals education gap or pretension.", "detection_hint": "Phonetic neighbor used incorrectly.", "false_positive_risks": "Dialect spellings or typos mistaken for malaprop.", "minimal_example": "“A preposterous suppository.”", "counterexample": "Correct usage: “preposterous supposition.”", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_double_entendre_worldview", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "double_entendre|deliberate", "description": "Line carries clean surface + sly secondary meaning.", "detection_hint": "Ambiguous phrasing that maps to two intents.", "false_positive_risks": "Unclear wording with no plausible second read.", "minimal_example": "“Nice spread.” (menu / suggestive)", "counterexample": "Ambiguity that confuses rather than layers.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_word_salad_pressure", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "word_salad|accidental", "description": "Ramble reveals fluster, lying, or cognitive overwhelm.", "detection_hint": "Derailing syntax, filler chains, topic jumps.", "false_positive_risks": "Poetic stream with intentional patterning.", "minimal_example": "“It’s not that, it’s—look, the thing is, because when—just forget it.”", "counterexample": "Structured associative riff with clear motif.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_pun_playful", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "pun|deliberate", "description": "Wordplay that signals playfulness or lateral linking.", "detection_hint": "Homophone/near-homophone pivot; compounding.", "false_positive_risks": "Unintended rhyme; accidental echo.", "minimal_example": "“Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.”", "counterexample": "Plain homophones with no twist.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "signal_id": "sig_wrongness_truth", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Imperfect delivery that reveals want, fear, or blind spot.", "detection_hint": "Fumble, overdo, derail at a pressure point.", "false_positive_risks": "Random error unrelated to character drive.", "minimal_example": "They confess—then joke it away, eyes wet.", "counterexample": "Flawless speech with no personal leakage.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "misconception_id": "generic_voice", "description": "Voice as accent or vocab list; missing motive and pattern.", "tells": "Swapped slang with same decisions and rhythms.", "likely_causes": "Surface-first drafting.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie device to want. Ask: what are they trying to get right now?", "micro_drill": "Write 3 lines where repetition pushes for a specific goal.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "misconception_id": "device_spam", "description": "Stacking devices without function.", "tells": "Pun+pun+pun, anticlimax every line.", "likely_causes": "Chasing flavor, not motive.", "corrective_feedback": "Pick one device per pressure point; vary elsewhere.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite with one chosen device and one plain line.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_voice", "misconception_id": "sterile_perfection", "description": "Perfectly crafted lines that leak no humanity.", "tells": "No fumbles under pressure; zero asymmetry.", "likely_causes": "Over-editing for polish.", "corrective_feedback": "Add one wrong note that exposes fear or hunger.", "micro_drill": "Insert an anticlimax or malapropism at the moment of highest stakes.", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_voice_identify_device_intent", "concept_id": "character_voice", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "For each line, label the device (repetition/anticlimax/malapropism/double entendre/word salad/pun) and whether it’s deliberate or accidental. Then say what it reveals about the speaker.", "expected_features": "Correct device + intent; trait/goal inference grounded in the line.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + sharp trait inference tied to wording.", "Meets": "Mostly accurate labels; reasonable inference.", "Developing": "Labels off; inference ungrounded."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include lines with surface echoes but no pressure; ambiguous ambiguity.", "hint_steps": "1) What do they want? 2) Where does it wobble? 3) Name the device.", "variation_axes": "stakes|relationship", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_voice_rewrite_for_reveal", "concept_id": "character_voice", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Rewrite the flat line so it uses exactly one device to reveal want or fear—without changing the meaning.", "expected_features": "Chosen device serves motive; ‘wrongness’ reveals interior.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Device feels inevitable; motive clear.", "Meets": "Device present; some reveal.", "Developing": "Device tacked on; no reveal."}, "distractor_strategy": "Add flashy wordplay that hides motive.", "hint_steps": "1) Name the want 2) Pick device 3) Add wobble point", "variation_axes": "device|pressure", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_voice_fix_scope", "concept_id": "character_voice", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "This malapropism lands as a typo. Fix it so it reads as character-revealing.", "expected_features": "Phonetic neighbor with intention; trait implication clear.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Reads unmistakably as malaprop with character read.", "Meets": "Recognizable; basic trait implied.", "Developing": "Still typo-ish or mean-spirited."}, "distractor_strategy": "Spelling errors with no nearby target word.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose near word 2) Anchor the context 3) Hint at motive", "variation_axes": "education|pretension", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_voice_generate_in_character", "concept_id": "character_voice", "cognitive_goal": "compose", "task_type": "generate", "prompt_template": "Write three lines a character would plausibly say under pressure using the same device twice and a plain line once. Make the motive legible.", "expected_features": "Two device uses + one plain; motive readable; not spammy.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Motive vivid; device earns its keep.", "Meets": "Device present; motive readable.", "Developing": "One-note or unclear motive."}, "distractor_strategy": "Overuse device; conceal motive.", "hint_steps": "1) Set pressure 2) Two device lines 3) One clean line", "variation_axes": "relationship|stakes", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_rep_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "repetition|deliberate", "label": "strong", "text": "“I’m here. I’m here, okay? Say it back.”", "context_tags": "urgency|care", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_anti_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "anticlimax|deliberate", "label": "strong", "text": "“I have something important to tell you—your pizza’s here.”", "context_tags": "deflection|humor", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_mala_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "malapropism|accidental", "label": "strong", "text": "“It’s a minor catastrophony.”", "context_tags": "pretension|charm", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_ent_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "double_entendre|deliberate", "label": "strong", "text": "“Your presentation was… firm.”", "context_tags": "sly|inappropriate", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_salad_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "word_salad|accidental", "label": "strong", "text": "“It’s—no, because—listen, the thing is—never mind.”", "context_tags": "flustered", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_pun_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "pun|deliberate", "label": "strong", "text": "“Grave men, near death, see with blinding sight—pretty dark humor.”", "context_tags": "playful|lateral", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_weak_1", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "“I speak in a unique way.”", "context_tags": "told_not_shown", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_voice_weak_2", "concept_id": "character_voice", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Catchphrase repeated with no pressure.", "context_tags": "spammy", "source_file": "Character & Voice.md", "source_md5": "fd9e821182a5e7456b8b57e589b7185e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:05:21.701062Z"}
